Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to providing identical health benefits for public retirees
Summary: Ensures that public retirees are not having their skilled nursing care benefits reduced under the state health benefit plan at the time they enroll for medicare.
LawCode: Amd ยง161, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to ensuring identical health benefits for skilled nursing care for public retirees
